sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; const FormDefault = () => { return (
Default Form Layout
Using the card component, you can extend the default collapse behavior to create an accordion.
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Horizontal Form Layout
Using the card component, you can extend the default collapse behavior to create an accordion.
Mega form
Account Information
Company Information
Billing Information
Inline Form
Use.form-inlineclass in the form to style with inline fields.
Inline Form with Label
Inline Form without Label
 ); }; export default FormDefault;
